医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
自然视频促进青少年心理健康：研究表明压力减轻并改善情绪简短的自然视频曝光可以改善压力、情绪和放松，凸显基于自然的干预措施对青少年心理健康的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Nature-videos-boost-adolescent-mental-health-Study-shows-reduced-stress-and-improved-mood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Nature-videos-boost-adolescent-mental-health-Study-shows-reduced-stress-and-improved-mood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b841a469-1b09-4a24-8af4-0b2a52a05270 Sun, 22 Oct 2023 22:15:00 -0400 Nature videos boost adolescent mental health: Study shows reduced stress and improved mood
COVID-19 与良性前列腺增生并发症的风险增加有关SARS-CoV-2 感染与良性前列腺增生 (BPH) 并发症和药物使用增加有关。 COVID-19 患者的泌尿系统表现强调了临床医生认识的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/COVID-19-tied-to-elevated-risk-of-benign-prostatic-hyperplasia-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/COVID-19-tied-to-elevated-risk-of-benign-prostatic-hyperplasia-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77234fa3-7d6d-422d-8fc4-287736f0b351 Sun, 22 Oct 2023 22:01:00 -0400 COVID-19 tied to elevated risk of benign prostatic hyperplasia complications
咖啡和遗传学：影响肾脏健康的复杂混合物研究人员深入研究咖啡因摄入量与遗传倾向之间的复杂关系，揭示了咖啡因对肾功能的矛盾影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Coffee-and- Genetics-A-complex-blend-impacting-kidney-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Coffee-and-genics-A-complex-blend-impacting-kidney-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d997c00-0d48-4e0e-8bdf-1fd9f36fb56f Sun, 22 Oct 2023 21:47:00 -0400 Coffee and genetics: A complex blend impacting kidney health
激素水平与肥胖的代谢健康有关研究人员研究了肥胖类型与血清瘦素 (LEP) 和脂联素 (ADP) 水平之间的关系，揭示了各种肥胖表型的代谢差异。他们的发现强调了脂肪因子、葡萄糖利用、脂质代谢和肥胖相关代谢紊乱之间的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Hormone-levels-tied-to-metabolic-health-in-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Hormone-levels-tied-to-metabolic-health-in-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efe6d934-e2fb-4dd6-83d0-6bd9d7da01d3 Sun, 22 Oct 2023 21:38:00 -0400 Hormone levels tied to metabolic health in obesity
染色质区室化如何影响 DNA 损伤反应研究人员发现了关于染色质区室化如何影响双链断裂 (DSB) 后 DNA 损伤反应 (DDR) 的新见解，揭示了基因组完整性维护和易位风险背后的机制。他们的发现揭示了染色体设计在 DNA 修复中的重要性以及对基因组稳定性和癌症易位的潜在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/How-chromatin-compartmentalization-affects-DNA-damage-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/How-chromatin-compartmentalization-affects-DNA-damage-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4349feb5-531f-45c0-8b05-05d79543d70c Sun, 22 Oct 2023 21:29:00 -0400 How chromatin compartmentalization affects DNA damage response
在咖啡和茶中加糖会影响您的寿命吗？ 32年的研究揭示了令人惊讶的结果一项针对丹麦男性的研究发现，在 32 年的随访期内，在茶和咖啡中添加糖并没有显着影响全因死亡风险、癌症相关死亡风险或心血管死亡风险，这对之前的糖摄入研究关于不良健康结果的发现提出了挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Does-adding-sugar-to-coffee-and-tea-impact-your-lifespan-32-year-study-reveals-surprising-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Does-adding-sugar-to-coffee-and-tea-impact-your-lifespan-32-year-study-reveals-surprising-results.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b9070f2-08af-4f77-ba1f-77c3d82255a9 Sun, 22 Oct 2023 21:01:00 -0400 Does adding sugar to coffee and tea impact your lifespan? 32-year study reveals surprising results
β-胡萝卜素可以促进认知健康吗？研究揭示了有希望的见解一项系统综述探讨了 β-胡萝卜素在增强认知功能方面的潜力，揭示了其潜在益处以及饮食干预对认知健康的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Can-Beta-carotene-boost-cognitive-health-Study-reveals-promising-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Can-Beta-carotene-boost-cognitive-health-Study-reveals-promising-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43ac86cb-2151-470b-ac90-ae1cfbc1ef13 Sun, 22 Oct 2023 20:46:00 -0400 Can Beta-carotene boost cognitive health? Study reveals promising insights
焦虑的影响：年轻人面临认知和心血管挑战在最近发表在《PLOS ONE》杂志上的一项研究中，科学家调查了年轻人的焦虑、抑郁、内皮功能和认知能力之间的联系，发现焦虑与认知表现不佳和内皮功能受损独立相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Anxietys-impact-Young-adults-face-cognitive-and-cardioangio-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Anxietys-impact-Young-adults-face-cognitive-and-cardioangio-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cda59e4c-663c-4002-a668-e1560a176cdf Sun, 22 Oct 2023 20:26:00 -0400 Anxiety's impact: Young adults face cognitive and cardiovascular challenges
全球高致病性禽流感H5N1激增《自然》杂志最近发表的一项研究揭示了 2021 年以来高致病性禽流感 (HPAI) H5N1 的复杂动态，揭示了病毒行为的关键转变，并为更有效的缓解策略提供了见解。该研究强调了了解驱动 HPAI H5N1 全球活动加剧的生态和病毒学因素的重要性，以便更好地准备和管理未来的疫情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Global-surge-of-highly-pathogenic-avian-influenza-H5N1.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Global-surge-of-highly-pathogenic-avian-influenza-H5N1.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82f10eaf-1f5d-44b5-ac6e-1c88244ab0f1 Sun, 22 Oct 2023 20:12:00 -0400 Global surge of highly pathogenic avian influenza H5N1
解码精神分裂症：基因发现的见解和影响《分子精神病学》最近的一项研究深入研究了精神分裂症的遗传结构，揭示了对该疾病常见和罕见的遗传变异、治疗耐药性和进化悖论的见解。这项研究强调了精神分裂症的复杂性以及对精神病学研究采用跨诊断方法的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Decoding-schizophrenia-insights-and-impacts-from-genic-discoveries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231022/Decoding-schizophrenia-insights-and-impacts-from-genic-discoveries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25195ca8-0e27-4806-be87-8f86d5032bf3 Sun, 22 Oct 2023 19:58:00 -0400 Decoding schizophrenia: insights and impacts from genetic discoveries
